messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:No Explanation Needed
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think this is true on any list, message board or discussion where you want other people to understand what you are talking about. IRL or online. ... You
messages.messageBody:
>>I've found that on this list you need to be especially clear what you are
>>talking about or who you are referring to in order to make your point
>>clear...>>

I think this is true on any list, message board or discussion where you want
other people to understand what you are talking about. IRL or online.

>>...and get the answers you are looking for.>>

You may *not* get the answers you are looking for no matter how clear you
are in your questions. The answers may be very different than what you were
originally looking for. They may come from a place that you never even
anticipated. It doesn't necessarily indicate lack of clarity. Sometimes it's
just a different perspective that requires thought and contemplation before
a response.

Life is good.
~Mary, the contemplater

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green
earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive."

~ Thich Nhat Hanh
